name: onEdge Tarot
description:
onEdge Tarot

Classic Past, Present, and Future three card spread using a stylized update of the Marseille Tarot. Each Card contains key word meanings including astrological and elemental associations where applicable.

OnEdge Tarot contains a full 78 card deck with user selectable inclusion or exclusion of the Minor Arcana and reversals. The app also contains a View Mode for quickly examining all cards in the deck.
